INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECT / PROGRAM MANAGEMENT - 4+ YEARS  Project Management PMI Trained, Agile Scrum Master Certified.  Expertise in eliciting project requirements through various standard approaches - meetings, workshops, gap analysis etc. to drive consistency in transition programs and projects.  Exceptional capability in executing entire IT project management activities with experience in end to end project delivery, identifying risk and issues, and escalating them to senior management for ensuring all the objectives are met within norms.  Proven record of analyzing processes & workflows, assessing their efficacy, relating to business plans & goals and suggesting re-engineering/simplification solutions.  Experience in managing projects with multi-disciplinary teams of varying sizes and complex programs of work & continually improve processes where possible while controlling adherence to standards and procedures.  A detail-oriented individual with excellent relationship management skills. Work History 2019-09 - Current COGNIZANT TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED SENIOR ASSOCIATE (ROLE - PROJECT MANAGER), Pune, Maharashtra PROJECTS HANDLED Virtual Security Network Readiness - Sterling Forest, NY v1-USA Scope: To allocate the Security ACN and CCTV IP ranges to the site, routing those ranges to Blue in the Core switches, consolidate EOL vUA switches and upgrade them with the latest switches and configuration template at Sterling Forest Site, NY.” The installation of the new VUA in the Generator / Chiller building is also to be done in this Project. Uplink connectivity for new in-scope vUA switches would be upgraded to 10G. Team to upgrade configurations upon hierarchy from Border Core, Firewall distribution, Virtual Service Core, Internet Distribution Switches and User access switches. This site is currently used by 2700+ end users which consists of other end devices such as Voip phones, Printers and fax machines. Bill of material contains EOL replacements, Incidentals and Licenses. Project Cost : USD $ 1M for all Hardware, labor charges, Licenses and Incidentals. Accomplishment: Project manager hosted multiple technical discussions before preparing project plan. Once project team had project plan, all stakes were engaged at right times for Finance approvals that arrived based on BOM (Bill of Material). Coordinated with Local Site contacts and Hands & feet support Vendors - Did Site survey to get timelines for floor readiness and Tech room readiness which was helpful to set time baseline for project. Involved team - System Engineers (Data & Voice), Architects, Coordinators, SMEs to prepare high-level project plan. Work Breakdown was done in project plan which became a key document and added value to project in every milestone. Engagement: System engineering team, procurement team, Sponsors, Architects were engaged at right time to obtain Approvals based on requirements validation as per Scope of project. Incidentals Such as Fiber patch cables (1G/ 10G), Stacking cables, CAT 6 Patch cables were also surveyed before procurements reach site to ensure site readiness and Smooth transition of this project.DATA CENTER INFRASTRUCTURE PROGRAMS / PROJECTS SUMMIT AVENUE SUITE- TX- LAN AND VOICE DEPLOYMENT-USA Scope: The current Softlayer building is getting converted to Datacenter building at 1700 Summit Avenue Suite 100, Plano, Texas and will require Blue network connectivity. To procure, physically & logically install, configure, maintain, and manage devices from End Core Switch until WAPs and EWLC for the whole site. This new hierarchy is set up to contain both Physical and logical changes to suit the latest standards of Stakeholders involved. To do survey, evaluate, represent the required team for this whole transition. This Project involves changes on both Data networks and Voice solutions across the site's end users. The Legacy Soft layer Site map is provided along with a heat map of access points. Project Cost : USD $ 1.7M for all Hardware, labor charges, Licenses and Incidentals. Accomplishment: This Project had multiple dependency over other ongoing projects. The project manager had to coordinate with this project team members along with other project managers/Teams to identify the timelines for each of the milestones. Project manager also had to coordinate with the Voice project manager which allowed to clearly prepare a project plan with dependencies. Risk mitigation plans were done after every phase of changes to avoid cross contamination of projects and its dependency. Engagement: Since multiple projects are interdependent, the Client was informed about any possible delays to save from any possible outages/risk of Hub and spokes sites interconnected to other 42 sites across the United States.
